item.title: Welcome to My Blog
item.description:
Welcome to my blog! ðŸŽ‰

I’m excited to finally have a space where I can share my thoughts on tech, development, pop culture, and everything in between.

What to Expect

Here’s what I’ll be writing about:

  • Tech & Development - Tutorials, tips, and thoughts on the latest in tech
  • Pop Culture - Because we all need a break from code sometimes
  • Behind the Scenes - What I’m working on and learning

Stay Connected

Make sure to follow me on social media for updates, or check back here regularly for new posts.

item.title: Now
item.description:
What I’m Doing Now

This is a now page. It’s a snapshot of what I’m focused on at this point in my life.

Work

Currently working in Developer Relations at GitHub, helping developers build amazing things with GitHub’s tools and platform.

Current Projects

  • Building out this personal site
  • Exploring AI development tools and integrations
  • Creating content about developer productivity

Watching

  • The Pitt - obsessed with this show right now
  • Fallout - still thinking about it

Reading

Add what you’re currently reading
